channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Citi Sees Possibility of $120 Oil if Supplies Are Disrupted
item.description: Crude oil prices could jump if supplies are disrupted by conflict in the Middle East, analysts at Citi Research said.

item.title: Nasdaq Leads Gains; Dow Closes Above 43000
item.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq added 0.8% and 0.9%, respectively. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 0.5%. Oil prices fell after China failed to provide de...

item.title: Analysts cheer Wells Fargo to 2018 highs after earnings. We have 1 qualm with the praise
item.description: We're not surprised that Wells Fargo's getting the recognition it deserves.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold futures lose some ground, with the front-month contract finishing down 0.4% to $2,657.80 an ounce.

item.title: We're hiking our Wells Fargo price target after the stock surged on earnings
item.description: Investors instead on the bank running leaner and generating better-than-expected profitability.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase shares pop 5% after topping estimates on better-than-expected interest income
item.description: JPMorgan said profit fell 2% from a year earlier to $12.9 billion, while revenue climbed 6% to $43.32 billion.

item.title: We're adding a new Bullpen stock, and it's a financial Cramer has had his eye on
item.description: BlackRock shares surged to a record high Friday after the asset manager posted third quarter earnings that crushed analysts' expectations yet again.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Falls, Waiting for Weather to Turn
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures fell sharply as production picked up with little near-term weather-driven demand seen beyond a cold shot expected midweek int...

item.title: Credit Cards Don't Require Signatures. So Why Do We Still Sign?
item.description: Putting your John Hancock on receipts has been optional since 2018, even on restaurant checks.

item.title: Evercore analyst says buy Apple on ability to beat low bar. We see no rush
item.description: Shares of the iPhone maker advanced 1.25% after Evercore ISI added Apple to its tactical outperform list.
